typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		AccountId as string,
		AccountName as string,
		Acronym as string,
		AccountCountry as string,
		Relation as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ProjectPartnerFunders
source(output(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PROJECT_TITLE as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPROJECT
source(output(
		FUNDER_SR_KEY as integer,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_NAME as string,
		ACRONYM as string,
		ACCOUNT_COUNTRY as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMFUNDER
source(output(
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY as integer,
		COUNTRY_CODE as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_ES as string,
		COUNTRY_NAME_FR as string,
		ISO2_CODE as string,
		ISO3_CODE as string,
		LEAST_DEVELPED_COUNTRY as string,
		LAND_LCKD_DEVELOPING_COUNTRY as string,
		SMALL_ISLAND_DEVELOPING_STATES as string,
		DEVELOPED_DEVELOPING_COUNTRY as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMCOUNTRY
source(output(
		RELATION_SR_KEY as integer,
		RELATION_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMRELATION
DIMPROJECT select(mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectProjectID
DIMFUNDER select(mapColumn(
		FUNDER_SR_KEY,
		ACCOUNT_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAccountName
DIMCOUNTRY select(mapColumn(
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_CODE,
		COUNTRY_NAME_EN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCountry
DIMRELATION select(mapColumn(
		RELATION_SR_KEY,
		RELATION_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelation
ProjectPartnerFunders, SelectProjectID lookup(upper(trim(ProjectID)) == upper(trim(PROJECT_ID)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupProjectID
LookupProjectID, SelectAccountName lookup(upper(trim(AccountName)) == upper(trim(ACCOUNT_NAME)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupAccounName
LookupAccounName, SelectCountry lookup(upper(trim(AccountCountry)) == upper(trim(COUNTRY_NAME_EN)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
LookupCountry, SelectRelation lookup(upper(trim(Relation)) == upper(trim(RELATION_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelation
LookupRelation derive({BATCH_ID } = 1,
		SOURCE = 'ProjectFunderPartners.csv',
		CREATED_BY = 'ProjectFunderPartners.csv',
		UPDATED_BY = 'ProjectFunderPartners.csv',
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		FUNDER_SR_KEY,
		COUNTRY_SR_KEY,
		RELATION_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		BATCH_ID = {BATCH_ID },
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FactProjectFunderPartner
